com.Netzwerk.de

Class XMLSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Netzwerk.de.XMLSetting

  • public class XMLSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describe a XMLInterpreter for the Server settings which read the settings from a XML file
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Pascal Sch√§fer
